attributes.title: Zero stars
attributes.review: It made me think that I was Sophia the first ğŸ‘ğŸ‘…ğŸ‘

attributes.title: It made my hair fall out!
attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: When I first opened app in June my screen went completely black. Once it turned on again my  phone was never the same again. Every time I went on a different app the screen turned black and showed pictures of the president. To this day my phone still acts the same. attributes.title: mourning in the loss of a loved one
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it traumatized my phone so much I had to send it to a therapist. The therapist has since talked to me and I have learned that my phone will never recover from the trauma I put it through. Such an awful app, not only is it run by a walking cheeto but now itâ€™s taken the life of my beautiful new iphone 11 and things will never be the same. My poor phone will never be the same again. I blame this app and itâ€™s stupid cheeto. I will NEVER forgive you for what you all have done.
